description: This file defines the implementation of the PlaybackClient class, which manages playback state reporting for a device, including updating resume points over HTTP in a client application that interacts with a media service.

classes.name: PlaybackClient
classes.description: A client class responsible for reporting playback resume points to a remote server, managing HTTP communication, and handling device information.

methods.name: uint32_t PutResumePoint(const string & appId,const string & contentPartnerId,const string & contentId,const double progress,const bool completed,const string & watchedOn)
methods.description: Constructs and sends an HTTP PUT request to update a resume point with details like progress, completion status, and tags.

methods.name: uint32_t ProcessPut(const string & url,const string & data,string & response,string & responseHeader)
methods.description: Performs the HTTP PUT operation, handling token refresh on authorization failure and translating HTTP response codes to internal error codes.

methods.name: PlaybackClient(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & host,const string & clientId,DeviceInfoPtr deviceInfoPtr)

ctags.name: PlaybackClient
ctags.signature: (PluginHost::IShell * shell,const string & host,const string & clientId,DeviceInfoPtr deviceInfoPtr)

ctags.name: ProcessPut
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t PlaybackClient::ProcessPut(const string &url, const string &data, string &respo/
ctags.signature: (const string & url,const string & data,string & response,string & responseHeader)

ctags.name: PutResumePoint
ctags.signature: (const string & appId,const string & contentPartnerId,const string & contentId,const double progress,const bool completed,const string & watchedOn)
